name: Ninja II
overview:
Only your fists can overcome the unrelenting forces that await you in the next installment of heart-pounding events!

Are you ready to re-enter the world of shadow warrior training? Sneaking, Grappling Hooks, Wolf Training, Energy Battles; these are but a few of the trials you must now face in this unforgiving sequel to "Ninja". Race against time, or those who desire the path, and set your sights on getting the top scores in order to be considered a true warrior of the shadows. Those who are able to complete the events at lightning fast speeds, will be handsomely rewarded. Now, let's once again continue the honorary path of becoming one with the shadows, in Ninja II!
